V03prmosubu:1: praṇamya pūrvaṃ jagati pradhānaṃ duḥkhālayottīrṇam anantapāram* /
V03prmosubu:14: nirvṛte mayi yuṣmākam eṣa śāstety abhiṣṭutaḥ // 7 //
V03prmosubu:23: buddhānāṃ sukham utpādaḥ sukhā dharmasya dhīṣaṇā
V03prmosubu:24: sukhā saṃghasya sāmagrī śramaṇānāṃ tapaḥ sukham* // 9 //
V03prmosubu:25: sukhaṃ darśanam āryāṇāṃ saṃvāso 'pi satā sukhaḥ /
V03prmosubu:26: adarśanena bālānāṃ nityam eva sukhaṃ bhavet* // 10 //
V03prmosubu:27: sukhaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ śīlavantaḥ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭā bahuśrutāḥ /
V03prmosubu:29: sukhā nadī sukhaṃ tīrthaṃ sukhaṃ dharmajito jataḥ /
V03prmosubu:31: sukho hi vāsaḥ kṛtaniścayānāṃ jitendriyāṇāṃ ca bahuśrutānām* /
V03prmosubu:32: śānteṣv araṇyeṣu jarāṃ gatānāṃ vaneṣu nirvāpitayauvanānām* // 13 //
V03prmosubu:33: nirgatam āyuṣmanto grīṣmāṇāṃ yāvat tāvad avaśiṣṭam* /
V03prmosubu:37: apramādādhigatāhi tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhir iti vā apy evaṃbhāgīyāḥ kuśalā dharmā bodhipakṣyāḥ /
V03prmosubu:39: anāgatānām āyuṣmantaś chandapariśuddhiṃ cārocayata ārocitāṃ ca pravedayata /
V03prmosubu:40: praṇamya śākyasiṃhāya bhūtvā hy asmai kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
V03prmosubu:41: prātimokṣaṃ pravakṣyāmi vinayaṃ tac chṛṇotu naḥ // 14 //
V03prmosubu:42: śrutvā ca tat karotv atra yathā proktaṃ maharṣiṇā /
V03prmosubu:44: yatnād drutaṃ satataṃ yaś ca cittahayaṃ mukhavacaneṣu anusārayati /
V03prmosubu:45: prātimokṣakhalīnam api sadṛśaṃ śatakaṇṭakaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ yenātividhyate // 16 //
V03prmosubu:46: mahātmanaḥ ye vacanamātreṇa yathābhāgān na nivartante /
V03prmosubu:48: yeṣāṃ tu khalīnam idaṃ na vidyate nāpi antaḥkāmaṃ /
V03prmosubu:50: śṛṇotu bhadantaḥ saṃghaḥ adya saṃghasya poṣadhaḥ cāturdaśikaḥ pāṃcadaśiko vā (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee 7)
V03prmosubu:51: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghasya poṣadhaṃ kuryāt prātimokṣasūtroddeśam uddeśayed eṣā jñaptiḥ /
V03prmosubu:52: poṣadhaṃ vayam āyuṣman kariṣyāmaḥ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam uddeśāmaḥ /
V03prmosubu:55: tūṣṇīṃbhāvena ca vayam āyuṣmataḥ pariśuddhān vedayiṣyāmaḥ /
V03prmosubu:56: yathāpi pratyekaṃ pṛṣṭasya bhikṣor vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati evam evaṃ evaṃrūpāyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi yāvat trir apy anuśrāvaṇaṃ bhavati /
V03prmosubu:57: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃrūpāyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi yāvat trir apy anuśrāvyamāne smaran satīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkaroti saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādo 'sya bhavati /
V03prmosubu:58: saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaḥ khalv āyuṣmantaḥ antarāyiko dharma ukto bhagavatā /
V03prmosubu:59: tasmāt smaratā bhikṣuṇā āpannena viśuddhāpekṣeṇa satī āpattir āviṣkartavyā /
V03prmosubu:60: āviṣkṛtenāsya phāsu bhavati nāviṣkṛtena na bhavati /
V03prmosubu:63: dvir api trir api pṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:64: atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:66: ime khalu āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:68: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ śikṣāsājīvasamāpannaḥ śikṣām apratyākhyāya śikṣādaurbalyam anāviṣkṛtyābrahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratisevate antatas tiryagyonigatayāpi sārdhaṃ,
V03prmosubu:69: ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:71_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur grāmagatam araṇyagataṃ vā pareṣāṃ adattaṃ steyasaṃkhyātam ādadīta
V03prmosubu:71_1: yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā rājamātro vā hanyād vā saṃbadhnīyād vā pravāsayed
V03prmosubu:71_2: vā evaṃ cainaṃ vadet* -- tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa cauro 'si bālo 'si steno 'sīty evaṃrūpaṃ
V03prmosubu:72: ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājayiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:74: yaḥ punar bhikṣur manuṣyaṃ vā manuṣyavigrahaṃ vā svahastena saṃcintya jīvitād vyaparopayet* /
V03prmosubu:75: śastraṃ vainām ādhārayec chastradhārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeta maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet* /
V03prmosubu:76_0: evaṃ cainaṃ vadet* -- haṃbho puruṣa kiṃ tava pāpakenāśucinā durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te
V03prmosubu:76_1: bho puruṣa jīvitād varam iti cintānumataiś cittasaṃkalpair anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya
V03prmosubu:76_2: vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya anusaṃvarṇayet sa ca tena kālaṃ kuryād ayam
V03prmosubu:78_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann asantam asaṃvidyamānam anuttaramanuṣyadharmam
V03prmosubu:78_1: alamārya viśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ sparśavihāratāṃ vā pratijānīyād idaṃ jānāmīdaṃ
V03prmosubu:78_2: paśyāmīti sa pareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno vā asamanuyujyamāno vā āpanno viśuddhiṃ
V03prmosubu:78_3: prakṣyaivaṃ vaded ajānann evāham āyuṣmanto 'vocaṃ jānāmīty apaśyāmīti riktaṃ tucchaṃ
V03prmosubu:78_4: mṛṣāvyapalapanam anyatrābhimānāt* ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:79_0: uddiṣṭā mayāyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamam āpattim
V03prmosubu:79_1: adhyāpatya na labhate bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvāsaṃ bhogaṃ vā yathāpūrvaṃ ca tathāpaścāt
V03prmosubu:80: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:81: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:82: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:84: ime khalv āyuṣmantas trayodaśa saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:88_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ samāpadyeta
V03prmosubu:88_1: hastagrahaṇaṃ vā bāhugrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇaṃ vā anyatamānyatamasya vā aṅgapratyaṅgasaṃsparśanaṃ
V03prmosubu:90: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avadalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhulayā pāpikayā asabhyayā maithunopasaṃhitayā vācā ābhāṣeta yathāpi tāṃ yuvā yuvatiṃ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:92_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avadalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya purastād ātmanaḥ kāyaparicaryāyā
V03prmosubu:92_1: saṃvarṇayed etad agraṃ mātṛsvasaḥ paricaryāṇāṃ yaduta mādṛśaṃ bhikṣuṃ śīlavantaṃ
V03prmosubu:92_2: kalyāṇadharmāṇaṃ brahmacāriṇam anena dharmeṇa paricared yaduta maithunopasaṃhitena saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:94: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeta striyaṃ vā puruṣamatena puruṣaṃ vā strīmatena jāyātvena vā jāritvena vā antatas tatkṣaṇikāyām api saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:96: svayaṃ yācitā bhikṣuṇā kuṭiṃ kārayitvā asvāmikām ātmoddeśikāṃ prāmāṇikā kuṭiḥ kārayitavyā /
V03prmosubu:97: tatredaṃ kuṭyāḥ pramāṇaṃ dairghyeṇa dvādaśa vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyā tīryak saptāntarataḥ /
V03prmosubu:99: abhinītair bhikṣubhir vāstu draṣṭavyam anārambhaṃ saparikramam* /
V03prmosubu:100_0: sārambhe ced bhikṣur vāstuny aparākrame svayaṃ yācitāṃ kuṭiṃ kārayed asvāmikām ātmoddeśakāṃ
V03prmosubu:100_1: bhikṣūṃś ca nābhinayed vāstu darśanāya anabhinītair bhikṣubhiḥ adarśitavāstuni pramāṇaṃ
V03prmosubu:102: mahallakaṃ punar bhikṣuḥ vihāraṃ kārayamānāḥ sasvāmikaṃ saṃghoddeśakaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣavo 'bhihitavyā vāstudarśanāya /
V03prmosubu:103: ataḥ abhinītair bhikṣubhir vāstu draṣṭavam anāraṃbhaṃ saparikramam* /
V03prmosubu:104: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣur vāstuny aparikrame mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kārayitvā yat sasvāmikaṃ saṃghoddeśakaṃ bhikṣūṃś ca nābhinayed vāstudarśanāya saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:106_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭoddeśād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ bhikṣuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayed
V03prmosubu:106_1: apy evainaṃ brahmacaryāc cyāvayeyam iti tasya ca apareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno
V03prmosubu:106_2: vā asamanuyujyamāno vā amūlakam eva svādhikaraṇaṃ bhaved bhikṣuś ca dveṣe pratiṣṭhed
V03prmosubu:108_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭoddeśād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ bhikṣuṃ anyasya vā anyathābhāgīyasya
V03prmosubu:108_1: adhikaraṇasya kañcid eva leśamātraṃ dharmam upādāya pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃsayed
V03prmosubu:108_2: apy evainaṃ brahmacaryāc cyāvayeyam iti tasya ca apareṇa samayena samanuyujyamānasya
V03prmosubu:108_3: vā samanuyujyamānasya vā anyabhāgīyaṃ tad adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati kaścid eva leśoddeśamātro
V03prmosubu:108_4: dharma upātto bhavati bhikṣuś ca dveṣe pratiṣṭhed dveṣād avocam iti saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:110_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramed bhedakaraṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ
V03prmosubu:110_1: cādhikaraṇaṃ samādhāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ
V03prmosubu:110_2: -- mā tvam āyuṣman samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramed bhedakaraṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ
V03prmosubu:111_0: sametv āyuṣman sārdhaṃ saṃghena samagro saṃghasahitaḥ saṃmodamāno 'vivadamānaḥ ekāgradharmoddeśaḥ
V03prmosubu:111_1: ekakṣīrodakībhūtaḥ śāstu darśayamānaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ vihāraṃ tu niśṛja tvam āyuṣman*
V03prmosubu:112_0: evaṃ cet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tathaiva vastu samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhet*
V03prmosubu:112_1: śuddhas tu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ na ca pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ
V03prmosubu:112_2: samanuśāsitavyaḥ tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ
V03prmosubu:112_3: samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:114_0: tasya khalu bhikṣor bhikṣavaḥ syur sahāyakāḥ vyagravādinaḥ eko vā dvau vā saṃbahulā
V03prmosubu:114_1: vā te tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeyuḥ -- mā yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ taṃ bhikṣuṃ kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ
V03prmosubu:114_2: vā kiṃcid vadata tat kasmād dhetor dharmavādī āyuṣmanto bhikṣur vinayavādī ca so
V03prmosubu:114_3: 'smākaṃ caiṣaś chandaṃ ca ruciñ cādāya tu vyāharati /
V03prmosubu:115: jānaṃś ca sa bhikṣur bhāṣate nājānan yac cāsya bhikṣoḥ rocate ca kṣamate ca asmākam api rocate ca kṣamate ca iti /
V03prmosubu:116_0: te bhikṣavo bhikṣubhir evaṃ syur vacanīyā -- māyuṣmanta evaṃ vadantu na ca sa bhikṣur
V03prmosubu:116_1: dharmavādī na vinayavādī adharmaṃ caiṣo 'vinayaṃ cāsmākaṃ chandaṃ ruciñ cādāya tu
V03prmosubu:116_2: vyāharati nājānaṃś ca sa bhikṣur bhāṣate jānaṃś ca yac cāsya bikṣoḥ rocate ca kṣamate
V03prmosubu:116_3: ca tavāyuṣmato 'pi saṃghabhedaḥ na rocate māyuṣmatām api saṃghabhedo rocate sametv
V03prmosubu:116_4: āyuṣmantaḥ saṃghena samagro hi saṃgho saṃmodamāno avivadamāno ekāgradharmoddeśaḥ
V03prmosubu:116_5: ekakṣīrodakībhūtaḥ śāstu darśayamānaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharantu /
V03prmosubu:117: tiṣṭha mā tvam āyuṣman saṃghabhedāya niḥsṛja imām evaṃrūpāṃ saṃghabhedakarāṃ kathām* /
V03prmosubu:118_0: evaṃ te bhikṣavo bhikṣubhiḥ dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyās tasya
V03prmosubu:118_1: vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyāḥ pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ
V03prmosubu:118_2: ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:120: saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ anyatamaṃ grāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upaniḥśritya vihareyus te ca syuḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ teṣāṃ ca kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyeran vā śrūyeran vā prajñāyeran vā /
V03prmosubu:121_0: te bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣubhir evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- āyuṣmantaḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ
V03prmosubu:121_1: yuṣmākaṃ kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi yuṣmākaṃ ca te
V03prmosubu:121_2: pāpasamācārā dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi prakramadhvaṃ āyuṣmantaḥ yūyaṃ
V03prmosubu:121_3: asmād āvāsād alaṃ yuṣmākaṃ iha vāseneti /
V03prmosubu:122_0: evaṃ cet te bhikṣavas tān bhikṣūn vadeyuḥ -- chandagāmina āyuṣmantaḥ bhikṣava dveṣagāmino
V03prmosubu:122_1: mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya
V03prmosubu:123: tatra bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- mā āyuṣmanta evaṃ vadata /
V03prmosubu:124: ekatya bhikṣavaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya bhikṣūn na pravāsayantīti /
V03prmosubu:126_0: neme bhikṣavaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca āyuṣmanta khalu
V03prmosubu:126_1: kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi pāpakāś
V03prmosubu:126_2: ca yuṣmākaṃ samācārā dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi /
V03prmosubu:127: bhikṣava āyuṣmantaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca -- niḥsṛjata imām evaṃrūpāṃ kathām* /
V03prmosubu:128_0: te bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣubhir evaṃ bhāsitavyāḥ -- evaṃ cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V03prmosubu:128_1: no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyās tasya pratiniḥsargāya
V03prmosubu:128_2: dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyāḥ pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V03prmosubu:130_0: bhikṣur iha kaścid durvācyasvabhāvo bhavati uddeśyaparyāpannaiḥ śikṣāpadaiḥ sugatasūtraparyāpannaiḥ
V03prmosubu:130_1: bhikṣubhiḥ sahadharmeṇa sahavinayenocyamāna ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti -- mā mām āyuṣmantaḥ
V03prmosubu:130_2: yūyaṃ kiṃcid vadata kalyāṇam akalyāṇaṃ vā aham api āyuṣmataḥ na kiṃcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇam
V03prmosubu:130_3: akalyāṇaṃ vā viramantu āyuṣmantaḥ mama vacanād aham api viraṃsyāmi yuṣmākaṃ vacanād iti /
V03prmosubu:131_0: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir evaṃ syād vacanīyo -- āyuṣman uddeśyaparyāpannaiḥ śikṣāpadaiḥ
V03prmosubu:131_1: sugatasūtraparyāpannaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ sahadharmeṇa sahavinayenocyamāna ātmānam tvaṃ
V03prmosubu:131_2: avacanīyaṃ karoṣi āyuṣman vacanīyam eva ātmānaṃ karotu āyuṣmantam bhikṣavo sahadharmeṇa
V03prmosubu:131_3: sahavinayena vadantu āyuṣmān api bhikṣūn sahadharmeṇa sahavinayena vadatu evaṃ saṃbaddhā
V03prmosubu:131_4: hi tasya bhagavataḥ tathāgatasya arhato samyaksaṃbuddhasya pariṣad yad idaṃ anyonyavacanīyād
V03prmosubu:131_5: anyonyāpattivyutthāpanād iti māyuṣman ātmānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karotu /
V03prmosubu:132_0: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir evaṃ bhāsitavyaḥ -- evaṃ ced tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ
V03prmosubu:132_1: kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya
V03prmosubu:132_2: pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyaḥ pratiniḥsṛjed
V03prmosubu:132_3: tad vastu ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
V03prmosubu:134: nava prathamāpattayaś catvāro yāvattṛtīyakā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamaṃ dharmam āpanno yāvatkālaṃ jānan pratichādayati tāvatkālaṃ tena akāmataḥ paryuṣitavyam* /
V03prmosubu:135: akāmataḥ paryuṣitaparivāsena bhikṣuṇā uttariṣaḍrātraṃ saṃghamānatvaṃ cartavyaṃ bhavati /
V03prmosubu:136: cīrṇamānatto bhikṣur āvarhaṇapratibaddhaḥ kṛtānudharmaḥ bhikṣusaṃghasya ārādhitacitto yatra syād viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃghasya tatra ca so bhikṣur āvarhitavyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:137: ekenāpi ced ūno viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃghas taṃ bhikṣum āvarhet sa ca bhikṣur anāvrīḍas te ca bhikṣavo gārhyāḥ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:138: yatrāhaṃ āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:139: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:140: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evaitad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:142: imau khalu āyuṣmantau dvau aniyatau dharmau anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchataḥ /
V03prmosubu:144: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eka ekikayā rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayed alaṃ kāmayitum* /
V03prmosubu:145_0: sacec chrāddheyavacanopāsikā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatamānyatamadharmeṇa vadet pārājikena
V03prmosubu:145_1: vā saṃghādiśeṣeṇa vā pāyantikena vā niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamānaḥ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām
V03prmosubu:145_2: anyatamānyatamena dharmeṇa kārayitavyaḥ pārājikena vā saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā pāyantikena
V03prmosubu:145_3: vā yena yena vā punaḥ śrāddheyavacanopāsikā taṃ bhikṣuṃ dharmeṇa vadet tena tena
V03prmosubu:147: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eka ekikayā rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayen nālaṃ kāmayitum* /
V03prmosubu:148_0: sacec chrāddheyavacanopāsikā dvayor dharmayoḥ anyatamānyatamadharmeṇa vadet saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa
V03prmosubu:148_1: vā pāyantikena vā niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānato dvayor dharmayoḥ saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā
V03prmosubu:148_2: pāyantikena vā yena yena vā punaḥ śrāddheyavacanopāsikā taṃ bhikṣuṃ dharmeṇa vadet
V03prmosubu:148_3: tena tena dharmeṇa sa bhikṣuḥ kārayitavyo 'yam api dharmo 'niyataḥ /
V03prmosubu:149: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaḥ dvāv aniyatau dharmau /
V03prmosubu:150: tatrāham āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:151: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:152: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:154: ime khalu āyuṣmantas triṃśan naisargikāḥ pāyantikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:156: niṣṭhitacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā uddhṛte kaṭhine daśāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaram avikalpitaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tataḥ uttari dhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:158: niṣṭhitacīvaro bhikṣuḥ uddhṛtakaṭhine ekarātram api cet trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatamānyatamasya cīvarād bahiḥsīmāṃ vipravased anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyā [Hs.:
V03prmosubu:161: niṣṭhitacīvarasya bhikṣor uddhṛte kaṭhine utpatya akālacīvaram ākāṃkṣinā tena bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaraṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ pratigṛhya sacet paripūryate kṣipram eva kṛtvā dhārayitavyam* /
V03prmosubu:162: no cet paripūryate māsaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaram upanikṣiptavyaṃ satyāṃ cīvarapratyāśāyām ūnasya vā paripūrayet tataḥ uttari upanikṣipen naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:164: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikayā bhikṣuṇyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhāvayed raṃjayed ākoṭayed vā naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:166: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikayā bhikṣuṇyā santikāc cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇīyād anyatra parivartakān naisargikapātayantikā /
V03prmosubu:168: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātigṛhapatiṃ gṛhapatipatnīṃ vopasaṃkramya cīvaraṃ vijñāpayed anyatra samayān naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:169: tatrāyaṃ samaya ācchinnacīvaro bhikṣur bhavati naṣṭacīvaro dagdhacīvaro ūḍhacīvaro hṛtacīvaro 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:171_0: ācchinnacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā naṣṭacīvareṇa dagdhacīvareṇa ūḍhacīvareṇa hṛtacīvareṇājñātigṛhapatinā
V03prmosubu:171_1: gṛhapatipatnīṃ cīvaraṃ vijñāpayitavyaḥ taṃ cec chrāddho brāhmaṇo gṛhapatir vātyarthaṃ
V03prmosubu:171_2: saṃbahulaiś cīvaraiḥ pravārayed ākāṃkṣatā tena bhikṣuṇā sāntarottaraparamaṃ tasmāc
V03prmosubu:171_3: cīvaraṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ tata uttari pratigṛhṇīyān naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:173_0: bhikṣuṃ khalūddiśyājñātinā gṛhapatinā gṛhapatipatnyā vā cīvaracetanakāni pratyupasthāpitāni
V03prmosubu:173_1: syuḥ ebhir ahaṃ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmā
V03prmosubu:173_2: bhikṣur upasaṃkramiṣyati tam ācchādayiṣyāmi cīvareṇa kāle kalpikeneti /
V03prmosubu:174_0: tatra caiko bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ san kaṃcid eva vikalpaṃ pratipadya tam ajñātiṃ
V03prmosubu:174_1: gṛhapatiṃ gṛhapatipatnīṃ vopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vaded yāni tāni āyuṣmatā mām uddiśya cīvaracetanakāni
V03prmosubu:174_2: pratyupasthāpitāni sādhyāyuṣmaṃs te cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca cīvaraṃ
V03prmosubu:179: ebhir āvāṃ pratyekapratyekaiḥ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca pratyekapratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmā bhikṣur upasaṃkramiṣyati tam ācchādayiṣyāvaḥ /
V03prmosubu:181_0: tatra cet sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ san kaṃcid eva vikalpam āpatya tam ajñātigṛhapatiṃ
V03prmosubu:181_1: gṛhapatipatnīṃ vopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vaded yāni tāny āyuṣmatyātmān uddiśya pratyekapratyekāni
V03prmosubu:182_0: sādhyāyuṣmatau tau pratyekapratyekaiś cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca cīvaraṃ
V03prmosubu:182_1: cetayitvā ācchādayatām ubhāv api bhūtvā ekaikena cīvareṇa kāle kalpikena kalyāṇakāmatām
V03prmosubu:184_0: bhikṣuṃ khalūddiśya rājñā vā rājamātreṇa vā brāhmaṇena vā gṛhapatinā vā naigamena
V03prmosubu:184_1: vā jānapadena vā dhaninā vā śreṣṭhinā vā sārthavāhena vā dūtasya haste cīvaracetanakāni anupreṣitāni syuḥ /
V03prmosubu:185_0: atha sa dūtas tāni cetanakāni ādāya yena sa bhikṣus tenopasaṃkrāmed upasaṃkramya
V03prmosubu:185_1: taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded yat khalv ārya jānīyāt tvām uddiśya rājñā vā rājamātreṇa vā
V03prmosubu:185_2: brāhmaṇena vā gṛhapatinā vā naigamena vā jānapadena vā dhaninā vā śreṣṭhinā vā sārthavāhena
V03prmosubu:185_3: vā cīvaracetanakena vānupreṣitāny āryaṃ pratigṛhṇātv anukampām upādāya /
V03prmosubu:186: tena bhikṣuṇā sa dūta idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ -- gacchāyuṣman dūta bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaracetanakāni patyante parigṛhītuṃ /
V03prmosubu:187: cīvaraṃ tu vayaṃ labdhvā pratigṛhṇīmaḥ kāle kalpikaṃ /
V03prmosubu:188: sa dūtas taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded asti kaścid āryāṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyakaro ya āryāṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyaṃ pratyanubhavatīti /
V03prmosubu:189: cīvarārthikena bhikṣuṇā vaiyyāvṛtyakaro vyapadeṣṭavya ārāmiko vā upāsako vā ete dūta bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyakarā ete bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyaṃ pratyanubhavantīti /
V03prmosubu:190: atha sa dūtas tāni cīvaracetanakāny ādāya yena sa vaiyyāvṛtyakaras tenopasaṃkrāmet* /
V03prmosubu:192_0: khalv āyuṣman vaiyyāvṛtyakara jānīyā ebhis taṃ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpam caivaṃrūpaṃ
V03prmosubu:192_1: ca cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmā bhikṣur upasaṃkramiṣyati tam ācchādayethā cīvareṇa kāle kalpiteneti /
V03prmosubu:193: atha sa dūtas taṃ vaiyyāvṛtyakaraṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyujya samanuśiṣya yena sa bhikṣus tena saṃkrāmet* /
V03prmosubu:194: upasaṃkramya taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded yo 'sāv āryeṇa vaiyyāvṛtyakaro vyapadiṣṭaḥ samanuśiṣṭaḥ samayena tam upasaṃkrāmethā ācchādayiṣyati sa satvāṃ cīvareṇa kāle kalpiteneti /
V03prmosubu:195_0: cīvarārthikena bhikṣuṇā vaiyyāvṛtyakara upasaṃkramya dvis triś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyo
V03prmosubu:195_1: 'rthiko 'smy āyuṣman vaiyyāvṛtyakara cīvareṇārthiko 'smy āyuṣman vaiyyāvṛtyakara cīvareṇeti /
V03prmosubu:196_0: dvis triś codayataḥ smārayataḥ sacet tac cīvaram abhiniṣpadyate ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V03prmosubu:196_1: no ced abhiniṣpadyeta catuṣpaṃcaṣaṭkṛtvaḥ paraṃ tūṣṇīm uddeśe sthātavyaṃ catuṣpaṃcaṣaṭkṛtvā
V03prmosubu:196_2: paraṃ tūṣṇahīm uddeśe sthitasya sacet tac cīvaram abhiniṣpadyeta ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V03prmosubu:196_3: no ced abhiniṣpadyeta na uttari dhyāyacchec cīvarasyābhinivartaye abhiṣpanne cīvare
V03prmosubu:197_0: no ced abhiniṣpadyeta yasyā diśas tāni cīvaracetanakāny ānītāni tatra svayaṃ vā gantavyam
V03prmosubu:197_1: āpto vā dūto 'nupreṣitavyaḥ yāni tāny āyuṣmadbhir evaṃnāmānaṃ bhikṣum uddiśya cīvaracetanakāny
V03prmosubu:197_2: anupreṣitāni na tāni tasya bhikṣoḥ kaṃcid arthaṃ spharanti prajānātv āyuṣmantaḥ svam
V03prmosubu:197_3: arthaṃ mā vo 'rthaḥ praṇaśyatv ity ayaṃ tatra sāmayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:199: yaḥ punar bhikṣur navaṃ kauśeyasaṃstaraṃ kārayen naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:201: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ śuddhakālakānām eḍakaromnāṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayen naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:203_0: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā saṃstaraṃ kārayatā dvau bhāgau śuddhakālakānām eḍakaromnām ādātavyau
V03prmosubu:203_1: tṛtīyo 'vadātānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇām anādāya ced bhikṣur dvau bhāgau śuddhakālakānām
V03prmosubu:203_2: eḍakaromnāṃ tṛtīyo 'vadātānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇāṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayen naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:205: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā saṃstaraṃ kārayatā akāmaṃ ṣaḍ varṣāṇi kṛtvā dhārayitavyam* /
V03prmosubu:206: arvāk ced bhikṣuḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ varṣāṇāṃ taṃ purāṇasaṃstaraṃ niḥsṛjya vā aniḥsṛjya vā anyaṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayed anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyā [saṃghasaṃvṛtyā] naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:208: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā niṣadanaṃ kārayitā purāṇaniṣadanasāmantakāt sugatavitastir ādātavyā navasya durvarṇīkaraṇāya /
V03prmosubu:209: anādāya ced bhikṣuḥ purāṇaniṣadanasāmantakāt sugatavitastiṃ navasya durvarṇīkaraṇāya navaṃ niṣadanaṃ paribhuṃjīta naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:211_0: bhikṣoḥ khalv adhvapratipannasyotpadyerann eḍakaromāṇy ākāṃkṣatā tena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhītavyāni
V03prmosubu:211_1: pratigṛhya yāvat triyojanaparamaṃ svayaṃ hartavyāny asati hārake tata uttari pāren
V03prmosubu:213: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikayā bhikṣuṇyā eḍakaromāṇi dhāvayed raṃjayed vivaṭed vivaṭāpayed vā naisargikapāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:215: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ jātarūparajatam udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhanasatvā naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:217: yaḥ punar bhikṣur nānāprakāraṃ rūpikavyavahāraṃ samāpadyeta naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:219: yaḥ punar bhikṣur nānāprakāraṃ krayavikrayaṃ samāpadyeta naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:221: daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekapātraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tata uttaraṃ paridhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:223: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnapaṃcabandhanena pātreṇa pāribhogikenānyaṃ navaṃ pātraṃ paryeṣeta /
V03prmosubu:225: tena bhikṣuṇā tat pātraṃ bhikṣuparṣady upaniḥsṛṣṭavyaḥ yaḥ tasyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi pātraparyanto bhavati /
V03prmosubu:226: tat tasya bhikṣor anupradātavyam idaṃ te bhikṣoḥ pātraṃ vādhiṣṭhātavyaṃ na vikārayitavyaṃ sacen mandaṃ mandaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ yāvad bhedanaparyantam upādāya ity ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:228: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svayaṃ yācitena sūtreṇājñātinā tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vāyeyam iti niṣpanne cīvare naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:230_0: bhikṣuṃ khalūddiśyājñātiḥ gṛhapatir vā gṛhapatipatnī vājñātitantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vāyayet
V03prmosubu:230_1: tatra cet sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ san kaṃcid eva vikalpam āpadya tam ajñātiṃ
V03prmosubu:231_0: yat khalv āyuṣmāṃs tantuvāya jānīyā idaṃ cīvaram asmān uddiśya ūyate sādhv āyuṣmaṃs
V03prmosubu:231_1: tantuvāya idaṃ cīvaraṃ suvistṛtaṃ ca kuru suvilikhitaṃ ca suvitakṣitaṃ ca svākoṭitaṃ
V03prmosubu:231_2: cāpy eva vayam āyuṣmate tantuvāyāya kāṃcid eva mātram upasaṃhariṣyāmo yaduta piṇḍapātaṃ
V03prmosubu:231_3: vā piṇḍapātamātraṃ vā piṇḍapātasaṃbalaṃ vā cīvarasyābhiniṣpattaye abhiniṣpanne cīvare
V03prmosubu:233: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoś cīvaraṃ datvā tataḥ paścād abhiṣiktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto nātmamanā ācchindyād ācchedayed vā evaṃ cainaṃ vaded ānaya bhikṣo cīvaraṃ na te bhūyo dadāmīti /
V03prmosubu:234: tena bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaraṃ tac ca śeṣam upaniḥsṛṣṭavyaṃ bhuktasya ca naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:236_0: daśāham āgatāyāṃ kārtikyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ bhikṣor utpadyetātyayakacīvaram ākāṃkṣatā
V03prmosubu:236_1: tena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhītavyaṃ pratigṛhya yāvac cīvaradānakālasamayād dhārayitavyaṃ
V03prmosubu:238_0: bhikṣavaḥ khalu saṃbahulāḥ āraṇyakeṣu śayanāsaneṣu na varṣakā bhavanti sāśaṅkasaṃmateṣu
V03prmosubu:238_1: nānābhayasaṃmateṣu sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu ākāṃkṣatā āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ
V03prmosubu:238_2: cīvarāṇām anyatamānyatamaṃ cīvaram antargṛhe upanikṣiptavyaṃ syāt khalv āraṇyakasya
V03prmosubu:238_3: bhikṣos tadrūpapratyayo bahiḥsīmāṃ gantuṃ ṣaḍrātraparamam āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā tasmāc
V03prmosubu:238_4: cīvarād bahiḥsīmāṃ vipravastavyaṃ tata uttari vipravasen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:240: māsyaḥ śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇā varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ paryeṣitavyam ardhamāsāvaśiṣṭā kṛtvā dhārayitavyam* /
V03prmosubu:241: arvāk ced bhikṣuḥ śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ paryeṣeta ūrdhvam ardhamāsāvaśiṣṭā varṣāḥ kṛtvā dhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:243: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇatam ātmanaḥ paudgalikaṃ pariṇāmayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:245_0: yāni tāni bhagavatā glānānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sāṃpreyāṇi pratisevanīyāni bhaiṣajyāny ākhyātāni
V03prmosubu:245_1: tadyathā sarpis tailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ tāny ākāṃkṣatā glānena bhikṣuṇā saptāhaparamaṃ
V03prmosubu:245_2: svayam adhiṣṭhāya saṃnidhikāraparibhogena paribhoktavyāni tata uttari paribhuṃjīta
V03prmosubu:246: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantas triṃśan naisargikapāyantikā dharmāḥ /
V03prmosubu:247: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:248: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:249: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:251: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ navatiḥ pāyantikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:259: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan samagreṇa saṃghena yathādharmam adhikaraṇam upanikṣiptaṃ punaḥ karmaṇaḥ khoṭayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:261: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmasyottari ṣaṭpaṃcikayā vācā dharmaṃ deśayed anyatra vijñapuruṣāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:263: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannāya pudgalāya padaśo dharmaṃ vācayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:265: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannāya pudgalāya duṣṭhulāpattim ārocayed anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyān [saṃghasaṃvṛtyā] pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:267: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannāya pudgalāyottaraṃmanuṣyadharmam ārocayed bhūtāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:269: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ samanujño bhūtvā tataḥ paścād evaṃ vaded yathā saṃstutikayāyuṣmantaḥ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇatam ātmanaḥ paudgalikaṃ pariṇāmayantīti pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:271_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśe uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadet kiṃ punar
V03prmosubu:271_1: ebhir āyuṣmantaḥ kṣudrānukṣudraiḥ śikṣāpadair anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśair
V03prmosubu:271_2: uccāryamānair yāni bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyāya saṃvartante ālekhāya vilekhāya vileṭhāya
V03prmosubu:279_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghikaṃ maṃcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā vṛṣiko vā biṃbopadhānacaturaśrakaṃ
V03prmosubu:279_1: vā abhyavakāśe upanikṣipyoparikṣipya vā anuddhṛtānuddhṛtya vā tato viprakrāmet santaṃ
V03prmosubu:281_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike vihāre tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ vā parṇasaṃstaraṃ vā saṃstīrya vā
V03prmosubu:281_1: saṃstārya vā anuddhṛtyānuddhārya vā tato viprakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra
V03prmosubu:283: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā sāṃghikād vihārād bhikṣuṃ niṣkarṣen niṣkārṣāpayed vā anyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:285_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike vihāre pūrvopagatānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tataḥ paścād āgatyānupraskandyāsane
V03prmosubu:285_1: niṣadyāṃ śayyāṃ vā kalpayed yasya saṃbādho bhaviṣyati sa viprakramiṣyatīti ity eva
V03prmosubu:287: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike vihāre uparivihāyasikṛtāyāṃ kuṭikāyām āhāryapādake maṃce vā pīṭhe vā sahasā balenābhipaded vābhinipadyeta vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:289: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakenodakena tṛṇaṃ vā gomayaṃ vā mṛttikāṃ vā siñcet siñcayed vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:291_0: mahāntaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ kārayitvā yāvad dvārakośārgalasthānād ālokasaṃjñinā bhūmiparikarmopādāya
V03prmosubu:291_1: dvau vā trayo vā chedanaparyāyāḥ saharitāḥ adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ tata uttari adhitiṣṭhet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:293: yaḥ punar bhikṣur asaṃmataḥ saṃghena bhikṣuṇīr avavadet tadrūpadharmasamanvāgamāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:295: saṃmataś cāpi bhikṣur saṃghena yāvat sūryāstagamanakālasamayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:297: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded āmiṣakiṃcithetor bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīr avadantīti pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:299: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikāyai bhikṣuṇyai cīvaraṃ dadyād anyatra parivartakāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:301: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikāyā bhikṣuṇyāś cīvaraṃ kuryāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:303: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇīsārtheṇa sārdham adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeta ato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:304: tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ sārthagamanīyo mārgo bhavati sāśaṅkasaṃmataḥ sabhayasaṃmataḥ sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmato 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:306: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇīsārtheṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya ekanāvam abhirohed ūrdhvagāminīṃ vā adhogāminīṃ vānyatra tīryakpārasantaraṇāt pātayantikā /
V03prmosubu:308: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmena sārdham eka ekayā rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:310: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇyā sārdham eka ekikayā rahasi praticchanne tiṣṭhet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:312: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṇīparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjītānyatra pūrvaṃ gṛhisamāraṃbhāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:315: tatrāyaṃ samayo glānasamayaḥ karmasamayaḥ adhvānamārgasamayaḥ cīvaradānakālasamayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:317: ekāvasathoṣitena bhikṣuṇā aglānenaikapiṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavyas tataḥ uttari paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:319_0: bhikṣavaḥ khalu saṃbahulāḥ kulāni saṃkrāmeyus tāṃś cec chrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayas
V03prmosubu:319_1: tv arthaṃ pravārayeyur maṇḍaiś cāpūpaiś cākāṃkṣibhis tair bhikṣubhir dvau trayo vā
V03prmosubu:319_2: pātrapūrāḥ pratigrahītavyāḥ tata uttari pratigṛhṇīyuḥ pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:320: dvau trīn vā pātrapūrān pratigṛhya tair bhikṣubhir bahirārāmaṃ gatvā santo bhikṣavaḥ saṃvibhaktavyā ātmanā ca paribhoktavyam ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:322: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhuktavān pravāritaḥ akṛtātiriktaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuñjīta vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:324_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ bhuktavantaṃ akṛtātirikte khādanīyabhojanīyenetyarthaṃ
V03prmosubu:324_1: pravārayed idam āyuṣman khāda idaṃ bhuṃkṣva ity āsvādanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur
V03prmosubu:324_2: āsvādito bhaviṣyati ity etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:327: tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ glānasamayaḥ karmasamayo 'dhvānamārgasamayo nāvādhirohaṇaṃ mahāsamājaḥ śramaṇabhaktasamayo 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:329: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuñjīta vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:331: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃnihitaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuñjīta vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:333: yaḥ punar bhikṣur adattaṃ mukhadvārāhāram āhared anyatrodakadantakāṣṭhāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:335_0: yāni tāni bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇītabhojanāny akhyātāni tadyathā kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ
V03prmosubu:335_1: matsyo māṃsaṃ vallūrī yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītabhojanāni ātmārtham aglānaḥ
V03prmosubu:335_2: parakulebhyo vijñāpya khāded bhuñjītā vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:337: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuñjīta pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:339: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule anupraskandyāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:341: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule praticchanne tiṣṭhet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:343: yaḥ punar bhikṣur acelakāya vā acelikāyai vā parivrājakāya vā svahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dadyāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:345: yaḥ punar bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:347: syād bhikṣos tadrūpaḥ pratyayaḥ udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ dvirātraparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravastavyaṃ tata uttari vipravaset pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:349: dvirātraparamam api ced bhikṣus tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravasāṃ udyūṣikāṃ vā gacched dhvajāgraṃ vā balāgraṃ vā senāvyūham anīkadarśanaṃ vā pratyanubhavet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:351: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāraṃ dadyāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:353: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāram upadarśayet* antatas talaśaktikam api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:355: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣoḥ duṣṭhulām āpattiṃ praticchādayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:357: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded ehy āyuṣman kulāny upasaṃkramāvas tatra te dāpayiṣyāmi khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāvadāptaṃ /
V03prmosubu:358_0: sa tasya dāpayitvā praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāvadāptaṃ tataḥ paścād evaṃ vaded
V03prmosubu:358_1: gaccha tvam āyuṣman na mama tvayā sārdhaṃ sparśo 'pi tu ekākina eva me sparśo bhavati
V03prmosubu:358_2: kathāyāṃ vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā ity udyojanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur udyojito bhaviṣyatīty
V03prmosubu:360: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ātmārtham aglāno vitapanaprekṣī jyotiḥ samavadhavyāt samavadhāpayed vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:362: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dhārmikasaṃghakaraṇīye bhikṣoś chandaṃ datvā paścād abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto nāttamanā kṣepadharmam āpadyeta /
V03prmosubu:363: āhara bhikṣoś chandaṃ na te dadāmīti pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:365: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ dvirātrād ūrdhvaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:367: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti /
V03prmosubu:368_0: so bhikṣur bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmann evaṃ vocas tathāhaṃ bhagavato
V03prmosubu:368_1: dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā
V03prmosubu:369_0: mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣuḥ na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ na ca punar bhagavān
V03prmosubu:369_1: evam āha anekaparyāyeṇa āyuṣmann antarāyikā dharmāḥ santaḥ antarāyikā evoktā bhagavatā
V03prmosubu:369_2: te ca pratisevyamānā alam antarāyāyeti niḥsṛja tvam āyuṣmann evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ /
V03prmosubu:370_0: so bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed
V03prmosubu:370_1: dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya pratiniḥsargāya dvir api
V03prmosubu:370_2: trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V03prmosubu:372_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathāvādinaṃ pudgalam akṛtānudharmāṇam apratiniḥsṛṣṭe tasmin
V03prmosubu:372_1: pāpake dṛṣṭigate ālāpayet saṃlapet tena sārdhaṃ saṃvaset saṃbhuṃjīta sahāgāraśayyām
V03prmosubu:374: śramaṇoddeśaś cāpy evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti /
V03prmosubu:375_0: sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣman śramaṇoddeśa evaṃ vocaḥ
V03prmosubu:375_1: tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā
V03prmosubu:376_0: mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣuḥ na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ na ca punar bhagavān
V03prmosubu:376_1: evāha anekaparyāyeṇa śramaṇoddeśa antarāyikā dhamāḥ santaḥ antarāyikā evoktā bhagavatā
V03prmosubu:378_0: sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu cet pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V03prmosubu:378_1: no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ
V03prmosubu:378_2: pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed
V03prmosubu:378_3: ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo
V03prmosubu:378_4: 'dyāgreṇāyuṣman śramaṇoddeśa nāsau bhagavāṃs tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāstā /
V03prmosubu:379_0: evaṃrūpasyānyatamānyatmasya brahmacāriṇaḥ pṛṣṭataḥ mā samanubadhāna yāvad apy anye
V03prmosubu:379_1: śramaṇoddeśāḥ labhante bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ dvirātraparamaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ sāpi te
V03prmosubu:379_2: adyāgreṇa nāsti cara careṇa mohapuruṣa naśyati /
V03prmosubu:380: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇoddeśam upasthāpayed vā upalālayed vā tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:382_0: navaṃ khalu bhikṣuṇā cīvaraṃ pratilabhya trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamaḥ
V03prmosubu:382_1: nīlo vā lohito vā pīto vā durvarṇīkaraṇāya ādātavyo 'nādāya ced bhikṣus trayāṇāṃ
V03prmosubu:382_2: durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamaṃ durvaṇīkaraṇaṃ nīlaṃ vā lohitaṃ vā pītaṃ vā navaṃ
V03prmosubu:384: yaḥ punar bhikṣu ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā svahastena udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhayed vānyatrādhyārāmagatād vādhyāvāsagatād vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:385: bhikṣuṇādhyārāmagataṃ vādhyāvāsagataṃ vā ratnaṃ ratnasaṃmataṃ vā udgrahītavyaṃ yasyedaṃ bhaviṣyati so hariṣyati ity evaṃ manasikṛtvā /
V03prmosubu:388: bhagavatā deśitam anvardhamāsaṃ snāyād anyatra samayāt tadatikramāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:389_0: ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ -- adhyardho māsaḥ śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ pūrvo māso varṣāṇāṃ ity ete
V03prmosubu:389_1: ardhatṛtīyamāsā uṣṇasamayo 'vaśiṣṭaṃ glānasamayaḥ karmasamayo vṛṣṭisamayo vātavṛṣṭisamayo
V03prmosubu:391: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya tīryagyonigataṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:393: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya kaccid asya bhikṣor muhūrtam api tāvad aphāṣaṃ sparśaṃ bhaved etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣoḥ kaukṛtyam upasaṃharet pātayantikā /
V03prmosubu:399: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:401: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣayed bhīṣāpayed vāntato hāsyaprekṣyam api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:403_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣor vā bhikṣuṇyā vā śikṣamāṇāyā vā śrāmaṇerasya vā śrāmaṇerikāyā
V03prmosubu:403_1: vā pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā upānahaṃ vā sūcīgharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vānyatamānyatamaṃ
V03prmosubu:403_2: vā jīvitapariṣkāram upanidadhyād upanidhāpayet tadrūpapratyayād anyatra pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:405: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoś cīvaram vikalya tataḥ paścād apratyuddhārya paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:407: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ kupito 'nāttamanā pariśuddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ bhikṣuṃ amūlakena saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayet pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:409: yaḥ punar bhikṣur apuruṣayā striyā sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāyādhvamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:411: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ steyasārthena sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāyādhvamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:413: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnaviṃśavarṣaṃ pudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvāyopasaṃpādayeta pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:414: sa ca pudgalo 'nupasaṃpannas te ca bhikṣavo garhyā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:416: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastena pṛthivīṃ khanyāt khānayed vā pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:419: pratyekapravāraṇāyā punaḥ punaḥ pravāraṇāyāḥ kālikapravāraṇāyā nityapravāraṇāyā anyatra ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:421_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣubhir āyuṣmatā tvayā śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti ucyamāna evaṃ
V03prmosubu:421_1: vaden nāhaṃ tava bālasya mūḍhasya duṣprajñasya vacanāni śikṣiṣyāmi yāvan nāhaṃ bhikṣūn
V03prmosubu:421_2: prakṣyāmi sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkadharān iti pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:422: sarvajñatākāmena bhikṣuṇā śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkadharā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V03prmosubu:424_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ bhedagṛhītānāṃ vivādam
V03prmosubu:424_1: āpannānāṃ tūṣṇīm upaśrutikas tiṣṭhed yad ete bhikṣavo vakṣyanti tad ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty
V03prmosubu:426: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃghe dharmikāyāṃ viniścayakathāyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ āsanāt tūṣṇīm utthāya prakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavapṛcchyānyatra tadrūpapratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:432: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle grāmaṃ praviśet santaṃ bhikṣum anavapṛcchya anyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:434: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sabhaktaḥ kule nimantritaḥ pūrvabhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeta santaṃ kulaṃ apratisaṃvedito 'nyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:436_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anirgatāyāṃ rajanyām anudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu ratneṣu ratnasaṃmateṣu
V03prmosubu:436_1: vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya indrakīlaṃ vā indrakīlasāmantakaṃ vā samatikraned
V03prmosubu:438_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtre uddiśyamāne evaṃ vaded idānīm ahaṃ
V03prmosubu:438_1: jānāmi āyuṣmanto 'yam api kila dharmaḥ sūtragataḥ sūtraparyāyāpannoddeśyam āgacchatīti
V03prmosubu:438_2: tatrāyuṣmantaṃ ced bhikṣavo jānīyuḥ niṣaṇṇapūrvaṃ āyuṣmatā dvitrikṛtvaṃ poṣadhe kaḥ
V03prmosubu:438_3: punar vādo bhūya iti āyuṣmato ajñānataḥ na muktiḥ yata āpattim āpannaḥ tato yathādharmaṃ
V03prmosubu:438_4: kārayitavya uttaraṃ ca kaukṛtyam āropayitavyaṃ -- āyuṣman te alābho 'labdhaḥ durlabdho
V03prmosubu:438_5: na sulabdho yat tvaṃ anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddiśyamāne na satkṛtya śṛṇoṣi na
V03prmosubu:438_6: gurukaroṣi nārthikaroṣi na manasikaroṣi ekāgracittenāvahitaśrotreṇa na śṛṇoṣi sarvacittasaṃkalpair api na śṛṇoṣi /
V03prmosubu:441: yaḥ punar bhikṣur asthimayaṃ vā viṣāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārayet tad bhedanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:443: bhikṣuṇā saṃghasya pīṭhaṃ vā mañcaṃ kārayatā sugatāṣṭāṅgulipramāṇāḥ pādāḥ kārayitavyā anyatra adhastāt* aṭanyās tata uttaraṃ kārayec chedanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:445: yaḥ punar bhikṣus tūlasaṃstṛtaṃ pīṭhaṃ vā mañcaṃ avanahed avanāhayed vā uddalanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:447_0: niṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārayatā prāmāṇikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ -- dīrghato
V03prmosubu:447_1: vitastrī dve sugatavitastyās tīryak sārdhavitastir daśānāñ ca vitastis tata uttaraṃ
V03prmosubu:449: kaṇḍupraticchādanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārayatā prāmāṇikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ -- dīrghataś catasro vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyas tiryag dve tata uttaraṃ kārayec chedanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:451: varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ bhikṣuṇā kārayatā prāmāṇikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ -- dīrghataḥ ṣaṭ vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyas tiryak sārdhe dve tata uttaraṃ kārayec chedanāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:453: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārayed uttaraṃ vā sugatacīvarāt pāyantikā /
V03prmosubu:454: tatredaṃ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ dīrghato nava vitastayaḥ tiryak ṣaḍ vitastayaḥ idaṃ sugatacīvarapramāṇam* /
V03prmosubu:455: Pay.Schl. uddiṣṭā mayāyuṣmanto navatiḥ pāyantikā dharmāḥ /
V03prmosubu:456: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ pṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:457: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tuṣṇīm evāhaṃ dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:459: ime khalv āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:461_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur antagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantyā ajñātyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ santikāt sahastaṃ
V03prmosubu:461_1: khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya khāded vā bhuñjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahirārāmaṃ gatvā
V03prmosubu:461_2: bhikṣor antike pratideśayitavyam garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ
V03prmosubu:461_3: pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmīti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:463_0: saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ kuleṣu nimantritā bhuṃjīran tatra ced bhikṣuṇī vyapadeśamānā
V03prmosubu:463_1: sthitā syād iha bhojanīyaṃ datta odanaṃ datta sūpaṃ datteti sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣubhir
V03prmosubu:463_2: evaṃ syād vacanīyā āgamayasva bhagini muhūrtaṃ yāvad bhikṣavo bhuṃjate /
V03prmosubu:464_0: ekenāpi bhikṣuṇā cet tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm apasārayituṃ na vacanīyaṃ sarvair bhikṣubhiḥ bahirārāmaṃ
V03prmosubu:464_1: gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśitavyaṃ garhyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpannā asātmyaṃ
V03prmosubu:464_2: pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāma iti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:466_0: yāni tāni kulāni śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmatāni yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasya śaikṣeṣu
V03prmosubu:466_1: kuleṣu śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmateṣu pūrvam apravāritasya khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya
V03prmosubu:466_2: khāded bhuñjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahirārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśanīyaṃ
V03prmosubu:466_3: tat sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmīti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
V03prmosubu:468_0: yāni tāni kāni śayanāsanāni sāśaṃkasaṃmatāni sabhayasaṃmatāni sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmatāni
V03prmosubu:468_1: yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasyāraṇyakeṣu śayaneṣu sāśaṃkasaṃmateṣu sabhayasaṃmateṣu
V03prmosubu:468_2: sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu pūrvam apratisaṃvidyate vane bahirārāmasya khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
V03prmosubu:468_3: khāded bhuṃjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyam asmy
V03prmosubu:468_4: āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmīti ayam
V03prmosubu:470: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:471: dvir api trir api -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:472: pariśuddhā āyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:474: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:476: parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:478: nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:480: nātyavakṛṣṭaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:482: na hastiśuṇḍakaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:484: na tālapatraṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:486: na kulmāṣapiṇḍakaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:488: na nāgaśīrṣakaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:490: parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:492: nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:494: nātyupakṛṣṭaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:496: susaṃvṛtā antargṛhe gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:498: supraticchannā antargṛhe gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:500: alpaśabdā antargṛhe gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:506: nodguṇṭhikā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:508: notkṛṣṭikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:510: notsaktikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:512: na vyastikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:514: na paryastikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:516: nolambikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:518: noṭṭambikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:520: notkuṭakayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:522: na nikaṭotkuṭakayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:524: na skambhākṛtā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:526: na kāyapracālakaṃ antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:528: na bāhupracālakaṃ antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:530: na śīrṣapracālakaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā / /
V03prmosubu:532: nāṃsotphatikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:534: na hastasaṃlagnikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:536: nānujñātā antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:538: nāprativekṣyāsanaṃ antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:540: na sarvakāyaṃ samavadhāyāntargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:542: na pāde pādam ādhāyāntargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:544: na gulphe gulpham ādhāyāntargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:546: na sakthani sakthi ādhāyāntargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:548: na saṃkṣipya pādau antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:550: na vikṣipya pādau antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:552: na vyataṅgikayā antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:554: satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:556: samatīrthikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:558: samasūpikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:560: sāvadānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:562: na anāgate khādanīyabhojanīye pātram upanāmayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:564: nodanena sūpikaṃ praticchādayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:566: sūpikena vā odanaṃ bhūyaskāmatām upādāya iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:568: nopari khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātraṃ dhārayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:570: satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:572: nātikhuṇḍakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:574: nātimahāntaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:576: parimaṇḍalaṃ ālopam ālopayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:578: na anāgate ālope mukhadvāraṃ vivariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:580: na sālopena mukhena vācaṃ pravyāhariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:582: na cuccatkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:584: naśuśaśutkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:586: na thutyutkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:588: na phuphphuphkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:590: na jihvāniścārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:592: na sikthapṛthakkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:594: nāvaraṇakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:596: na gallāpahārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:598: na jihvāsphoṭakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:600: na kavalacchedakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:602: na hastāvalehakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:604: na pātrāvalehakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:606: na hastasaṃdhūnakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:608: na pātrasaṃdhūnakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:610: na stūpākṛtim avagṛhya piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:612: nāvadhyānaprekṣiṇo 'ntarikasya bhikṣoḥ pātram avalokayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:614: na sāmiṣeṇa pāṇinā udakasthālakaṃ grahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:616: na sāmiṣeṇodakenāntarikaṃ bhikṣuṃ sekṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:618: na sāmiṣam udakam antargṛhe chorayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:620: na pātreṇa vighasaṃś chorayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:622: anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pātraṃ sthāpayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:624: na taṭe na prapāte na prāgbhāre pātraṃ sthāpayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:626: notthitāḥ pātraṃ nirmādayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:628: na taṭe na prapāte na prāgbhāre pātraṃ nirmādayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:630: na nadyāḥ kāryakāriṇyā pratisrotaḥ pātrodakaṃ grahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:632: na utthitā niṣaṇṇāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:634: na niṣaṇṇā nipaṇṇāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:636: na nīcatarake āsane niṣaṇṇā uccatarake āsane niṣaṇṇāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:638: na pṛṣṭhato gacchantaḥ purato gacchate aglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:640: nonmārgeṇa gacchanto mārgeṇa gacchate āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:642: nodguṇṭhikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:644: notkṛṣṭikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:646: notsaktikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:648: na vyastikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:650: na paryastikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:652: noṣṇīṣaśirase āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:654: na kholāśirase āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:656: na mauliśirase āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:658: na mālāśirase āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:660: na veṣṭitaśirase āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:662: na hastyārūḍhāya āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:664: na aśvārūḍhāya āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:666: na śivikārūḍhāya āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:668: na yānāruḍhāya āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:670: na pādukārūḍhāya āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:672: na daṇḍapāṇaye āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:674: na chatrapāṇaye āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:676: na śastrapāṇaye āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:678: na khaḍgapāṇaye āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:680: nāyudhapāṇaye āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:682: saṃnaddhāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:684: nāglānā utthitā uccāraprasrāvaṃ kariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:686: nāglānāḥ udake uccāraprasrāvaṃ kheṭaṃ siṃghāṇakaṃ vāntaṃ viriktaṃ chorayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:688: nāglānā saharite pṛthivīpradeśe uccāraprasrāvaṃ kheṭaṃ siṃghāṇakaṃ vāntaṃ viriktaṃ chorayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:690: nāsādhikapauruṣaṃ vṛkṣam adhirokṣyāmo 'nyatrāpada iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V03prmosubu:691: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaḥ saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣā dharmāḥ /
V03prmosubu:692: tatrāham āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddāḥ
V03prmosubu:693: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:694: pariśuddhā āyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi //
V03prmosubu:696: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ saptādhikaraṇaśamathāḥ dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
V03prmosubu:704: utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāny ebhiḥ saptabhir adhikaraṇaśamathair dharmair dāpayiṣyāmaḥ śamayiṣyāmo vyupaśamayiṣyāmo dharmavinaye śāstuḥ śāsane /
V03prmosubu:706: tatrāham āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V03prmosubu:707: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ /
V03prmosubu:708: pariśuddhā āyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam evāhaṃ dhārayāmi /
V03prmosubu:709: For the prose and verses see Klaus T. Schmidt:
V03prmosubu:710: Der Schlußteil des Prātimokṣasūtra der Sarvāstivādins,
V03prmosubu:711: Text in Sanskrit und Tocharisch A verglichen mit den Parallelversionen anderer Schulen,
V03prmosubu:715: uddiṣṭāś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmās trayodaśa saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmā dvāv aniyatau dharmau /
V03prmosubu:716_0: triṃśan naiḥsargikapāyantikā dharmāḥ navati pāyantikā dharmāś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā
V03prmosubu:716_1: dharmāḥ saṃbahulā śaikṣā dharmāḥ saptādhikaraṇaśamathā dharmā etāvat tasya bhagavatas
V03prmosubu:716_2: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sūtragataṃ sūtraparyāpannam iti yo vā punar
V03prmosubu:716_3: anyo 'py āgacched dharmasyānudharmaḥ tatra sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ saṃmodamānair avivadamānais
V03prmosubu:717: kṣāntiḥ paramaṃ tapas titikṣā nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāḥ /
V03prmosubu:718: na hi pravrajitaḥ paropatāpī śramaṇo bhavati parān viheṭhayānaḥ // 1
V03prmosubu:723: mātrajñatā ca bhakte 'smin prāntaṃ ca śayanāsanam*
V03prmosubu:725: yathāpi bhramaraḥ puṣpād varṇagandhāv aheṭhayan* [yathā hi] /
V03prmosubu:726: ḍayate rasam ādāya evaṃ grāme muniś caret* // 4
V03prmosubu:727: na pareṣāṃ vilomāni na pareṣāṃ kṛtākṛtam* /
V03prmosubu:728: ātmanas tu samīkṣeta samāni viṣamāṇi ca // 5
V03prmosubu:729: adhicetasi mā pramādyato munino maunapadeṣu śikṣataḥ {B:
V03prmosubu:732: śokā na bhavanti tāyina upaśāntasya sadā smṛtimataḥ // 6
V03prmosubu:733: dadataḥ puṇyaṃ pravardhate vairaṃ saṃyamato na cīyate /
V03prmosubu:734: kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayatas tu nirvṛtiḥ {B: kṣayitas} // 7
V03prmosubu:737: kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācātha saṃvaraḥ {B: vācā ca} /
V03prmosubu:738: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ /
V03prmosubu:740: vācānurakṣī manasā susaṃvṛtaḥ kāyena caivākuśalaṃ na kuryāt* /
V03prmosubu:741: etāṃs trīn karmapathān viśodhya nārāgayen mārgam ṛṣipraveditam* // 10
V03prmosubu:742: buddho vipaśyī ca śikhī ca viśvabhu krakutsundaḥ kanakamuniś ca kāśyapaḥ {B:
V03prmosubu:744: anuttaraḥ śākyamuniś ca gautamo devātidevo naradamyasārathiḥ // 11
V03prmosubu:747: asmin sagauravā buddhā buddhānāṃ śrāvakāś ca ye /
V03prmosubu:751: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // 14
V03prmosubu:752: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
V03prmosubu:756: yasyārthe sūtram uddiṣṭaṃ yasyārthe poṣadhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
V03prmosubu:757: tac chīlam anurakṣadhvaṃ bālāgraṃ camaro yathā // 17
V03prmosubu:759: aśeṣas tena loko 'yaṃ maunīndraṃ padam āpnuyāt // 18
